what: The rgeomex provides the polygon data of INEGI 2019 and INE 2020
title: The rgeomex provides the polygon data of INEGI 2019 and INE 2020
text: rgeomex package developed CENAPRECE dengue prevention control program collaboration INDRE, states Veracruz Yucatan.

title: The rgeomex provides the polygon data of INEGI 2019 and INE 2020
text: rgeomex. Geographic data geographical datasets INEGI INE available R package rgeomex. Geographical data various resolutions (states, municipalities, localities, agebs, blocks, sectors, neighborhoods) constitute majority package’s content. rgeomex constitutes transversal package ETVerse IVAverse initiatives. rgeomex, together denepikit, denhotspots, deneggs, dencontrol packages, constitute universe packages make dengueverse dengue prevention control program Mexico. package six spatial datasets. blocks_ine20_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data blocks Mexico (INE 2020). loc_inegi19_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data localities Mexico (INEGI 2019). AGEB_inegi_2019_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data AGEBs (Area Geostadística Basica) Mexico (INEGI 2019). AGEE_inegi19_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data AGEE (Area Geostadística Estatal) Mexico (INEGI 2019). AGEM_inegi19_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data AGEM (Area Geostadística Municipal) Mexico (INEGI 2019). sectores_ine20_mx spatial dataset containing polygon data sectores INE Mexico. package currently available R, hope soon become available Python.

title: Polygons of AGEBs from México of the National Institute of Geography and Statistics 2019 — AGEB_inegi_2019_a
Polygons of AGEBs from México of the National Institute of Geography and Statistics 2019 — AGEB_inegi_2019_a
text: sf object 80202 rows 10 variables: OBJECTID ids. CVEGEO string key. key included CVE_ENT, CVE_MUN, CVE_LOC CVE_AGEB CVE_ENT string key state. CVE_MUN string key Municipality. CVE_LOC string key locality. CVE_AGEB string key AGEB. Ambito binary variable two values, Urbana Rural. dataset inly AGEB Urban Shape_Leng length polygon geometry simple feature.

text: Returns vector similar string another vector. Returns vector length input vector '.s'.

text: .s character vector matched. .t character vector matched . max_dist maximum string distance verbose warnings printed console. ignore_case case ignored? Default TRUE. feeling_lucky multiple similar strings found. first one returned? ... arguments passed utils::adist.
